selfCustodial.question: What is a self-custodial wallet?
selfCustodial.answer: A self-custodial wallet is a type of wallet where you have full control and ownership of your private keys. This means you are the only one with access to your funds, without relying on a third party. It's crucial to securely back up your private keys to avoid losing access to your Bitcoin.

buySell.question: Can I buy and sell Bitcoin directly through the app?
buySell.answer: Yes! Our app allows you to buy and sell Bitcoin directly, provided you complete a Know Your Customer (KYC) identity verification process. This ensures compliance with local regulations and the security of your transactions.

security.question: Is my personal information secure?
security.answer: Absolutely! We prioritize the privacy and security of your data. All personal information is securely stored and never shared with third parties without your explicit consent.

faqPage.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our self-custodial Bitcoin wallet.

warning.title: Beware of scammers asking for your 12-word seed!
warning.description: Grimm App is self-custodial: you (and only you) have the key controlling the funds in the wallet. This key is made of a 12-word mnemonic, known as a 'seed'. You can find it in the app settings. Make a backup, and keep it safe. If you lose your seed, we can't help you.
warning.advice: Do not enter your seed in any websites or Google forms. Our support team will never ask for it.

questions.question: What is a self-custodial wallet?
questions.answer: A self-custodial wallet is a type of wallet where you have full control and ownership of your private keys. This means you are the only one with access to your funds, without relying on a third party. It's crucial to securely back up your private keys to avoid losing access to your Bitcoin.

questions.question: Can I buy and sell Bitcoin directly through the app?
questions.answer: Yes! Our app allows you to buy and sell Bitcoin directly, provided you complete a Know Your Customer (KYC) identity verification process. This ensures compliance with local regulations and the security of your transactions.

questions.question: Why do I need to complete KYC to buy or sell Bitcoin?
questions.answer: KYC (Know Your Customer) verification is a legal requirement that helps prevent fraud, money laundering, and other illegal activities. It ensures a safe and regulated environment for all transactions.

questions.question: Is my personal information secure?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We prioritize the privacy and security of your data. All personal information is securely stored and never shared with third parties without your explicit consent.

questions.question: Is the app customizable?
questions.answer: Yes, our app is designed to be customizable. You can personalize the appearance and certain features to suit your preferences, creating a unique user experience.

questions.question: What fees are associated with transactions?
questions.answer: We maintain transparent fees for buying, selling, and transferring Bitcoin. You can view detailed fee information within the app before completing a transaction.

questions.question: What happens if I lose my private key?
questions.answer: As a self-custodial wallet, you are the sole owner of your private keys. If you lose them, we cannot recover them for you. We strongly recommend securely backing up your private keys in a safe place.

questions.question: Does the app support other cryptocurrencies?
questions.answer: Currently, our app focuses exclusively on Bitcoin to provide an optimized and secure experience. However, we plan to support additional cryptocurrencies in the future.

questions.question: Is the app available in all countries?
questions.answer: The app is accessible in most countries, but certain features, such as buying and selling Bitcoin, may be restricted depending on local regulations.

questions.question: How can I get help if I encounter an issue?
questions.answer: Our support team is here to assist you. You can contact us directly through the app or send an email to our customer support. We'll respond to your inquiries as quickly as possible.
